author: AdrianBuMo
title: Highly recommended
text: This hotel has a very good location. The metro station is 5 minutes walking. If you like to walk you can get to Moulin Rouge and Basilique du Sacré cœur really easy. There are also lots of Brasseries , bars and Restaurants near. The rooms are small but very nice and in excellent conditions. The people from from the hotel is also very kind. I would definitely go back to that Hotel the next time I'll go to Paris.
